CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , we demonstrate for the first time that spirobifluorene can be a very useful building block to construct main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymer , poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] ( PSFDTBT ) as shown in Scheme 1 , for high efficiency polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Main chain
3. Donor
4. Acceptor
5. Conjugated polymer
6. Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] ( PSFDTBT )
7. Scheme 1
8. 9,9′-Spirobifluorene
9. 2,7-(3′,6′-Dioctyloxy)
10. 5,5-(4′,7′-Di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)
11. 2,1′,3′-Benzothiadiazole

These are the Material Name entities identified in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Spirobifluorene
2. PSFDTBT (Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)])
3. 9,9′-Spirobifluorene
4. 2,7-(3′,6′-Dioctyloxy)
5. 5,5-(4′,7′-Di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)
6. 2,1′,3′-Benzothiadiazole

These are the Material Name entities that clearly refer to materials mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , we demonstrate for the first time that spirobifluorene can be a very useful building block to construct main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymer , poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] ( PSFDTBT ) as shown in Scheme 1 , for high efficiency polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Main chain
3. Donor - acceptor
4. Conjugated polymer
5. Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] (PSFDTBT)
6. Scheme 1
7. High efficiency polymer solar cells.

These are the identified Property Name entities in the given paragraph. Spirobifluorene and PSFDTBT are the specific types or names of the building blocks or polymers used in the process described in the paragraph. Main chain, donor-acceptor, and conjugated polymer are the properties or categories of the materials being discussed. Scheme 1 is a representation or visual aid used to illustrate the process. High efficiency polymer solar cells is the intended application or goal of the research described in the paragraph.

2. Donor-acceptor
3. Conjugated polymer
4. PSFDTBT
